message.content:
cs.CY, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.SE, cs.PF

Reasoning: 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper discusses the performance measurement system of R&D in Korea, which can be considered as a societal issue related to technology and innovation. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper uses system dynamics to model the R&D performance measurement system, which involves the use of algorithms and data structures. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks): The paper discusses the impact of peer review and evaluation on R&D performance, which can be related to social and information networks. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper discusses the evaluation policies and their impact on R&D performance, which can be related to software engineering practices. 
- cs.PF (Performance): The paper focuses on the performance measurement system of R&D in Korea, which can be considered as a performance-related issue.
